name: Larco's Quest
description:
Larco's Quest:

------ Story ------

You play as Larco, the glowing man and must save your brother from the evil clutches of the Hive-Mind in this arcade/adventure like experience.

------ Gameplay ------

You navigate the world given in an RPG-style level system. You can walk in 8-directions to avoid and maneuver around enemies. You must reach the end of each level to proceed to the next. You are given 10 lives for the entire run. If you run out of lives, you must restart from the forest. If you win or if you get a Game-Over, you could also put your High-Scores in!

------ Credits ------

This game was created by Scott Zimmerman (@ScottZimmerman) and was made using Clickteam Fusion 2.5!
